title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche digitali | SEND collection points
description: Search for the SEND collection point closest to you to collect a copy of the notified documents or discover if there is a notification of receipt intended for you

search.title: Find a SEND collection point
search.description_1: When you receive a legal communication via SEND, you can collect a printed copy of the notified documents at
search.description_3: Search for the collection point closest to you.
search.disclaimer: Currently you can only search for collection points located in the Municipalities of Bari, Taranto and Parma: the service is being activated progressively in the rest of the country.
search.placeholder: Search by city or ZIP CODE
search.empty_state: There are no SEND collection points active in this city.

infoblock.title: What to bring with you
infoblock.description: To collect the notified documents, you will always need your identity card and your tax code.
infoblock.details_link_text: how the SEND collection points function

how_it_works.title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche digitali | How the collection points function
how_it_works.description: Learn about how the service functions for collecting a copy of the legal communication that you receive via SEND in the territory
